feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Hide power role for v3 apps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14813
  • Fix: Updated URL in automation error notification to point to settings by @saewoohan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14817
  • Multi-inheritance RBAC (backend) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14816
  • Allow passing test to row action test by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14822
  • Release v3 to QA by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14826
  • Release v3 to QA by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14827
  • Backporting types from v3 to support updating pro submodule. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14829
  • Filling out FeatureFlag enum by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14828
  • deprecates Section component by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14837
  • Support user in automation context by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14825
  • Navigate to automation on creation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14842
  • Allow serving old apps on local dev by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14845
  • MySQL queries - forward slashes in bindings by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14855
  • Add tests for SQL injection attacks on table/view creation and search. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14861
  • Open API - security update by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14868
  • Update pro submodule by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14851
  • Public API test changes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14874
  • Add settings to automation context. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14801

New Contributors

  • @saewoohan made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14817

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.2...2.33.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Support multiple relationships same tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14877
  • Gro 738 refactor code that returns the account holder from user by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14872

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.3...2.33.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Publish automation-branching-ux to QA by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14889
  • Fix automation log pagination by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14895
  • Public role access issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14898

This is the first release after a problem in our release pipeline, releases 2.33.5 to 2.33.11 are unavailable.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.4...2.33.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reenable cache by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14916
  • Nodemon config update by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14919
  • Fix builder serve endpoint error rate by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14923
  • Improve users sort by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14894
  • Don't throw if no account-holder is found by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.12...2.33.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix handling of the Postgres money field. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14931

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.13...2.33.14
